nodes.text: Flashflies were a type of flying creature. The Chiss sky-walker Che'ri often drew pictures of flashflies and birds. Based on this and the fact that she drew landscapes from above, Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo deduced that she wished to learn how to fly. Che'ri initially denied this, claiming lots of children drew flashflies as they were pretty, but eventually admitted he was correct.
Flashflies were first mentioned in the 2020 novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Chaos Rising, which was written by Timothy Zahn.
